articles.title: Tesla says big car makers using disproved arguments to fight NZ carbon targets - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Government's proposed greenhouse gas emission targets for NZ imported cars won't leap-frog Europe for long, EV leader suggests.
articles.content:
Tesla has told MPs that big car manufacturers are rehashing old and disproved arguments to try to persuade them to water down the Governments proposed Clean Car Standard.

articles.title: Covid-19: You'll be able to use your NZ vaccine certificate to travel to Europe - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: The European Union says it will recognise New Zealand's vaccine certificates.
articles.content:
Kiwis will be able to use their vaccine certificates to enter European Union (EU) countries.

articles.author: Graham Ruthven
articles.title: Switzerland beat Bulgaria to snatch Group C top spot from Italy to qualify automatically for World Cup - Eurosport.com
articles.description: Switzerland qualified automatically for the 2022 World Cup after beating Bulgaria to snatch top spot in Group C away from European champions Italy.
articles.content:
Switzerland celebrate scoring against Bulgaria
